created_at.description: The time the organization was created

details.description: Any details obout the organization, such as the address

domain_names.description: An array of domain names associated with this organization

external_id.description: A unique external id to associate organizations to an external record. The id is case-insensitive. For example, 'company1' and 'Company1' are considered the same

group_id.description: New tickets from users in this organization are automatically put in this group

id.description: Automatically assigned when the organization is created

name.description: A unique name for the organization

anyOf.description: Any notes you have about the organization

shared_comments.description: End users in this organization are able to see each other's comments on tickets

shared_tickets.description: End users in this organization are able to see each other's tickets

updated_at.description: The time of the last update of the organization

url.description: The API url of this organization
